function.name: IsAttached
function.desc: Returns ''true'' if the wheel is attached to a vehicle.

function.name: GetChassisConnectionPoint
function.desc: Returns the position at which the wheel is attached to the vehicle.

function.name: IsFrontWheel
function.desc: Returns ''true'' if the wheel is a front wheel.

function.name: GetWheelAxle
function.desc: Returns the wheel's unit axis direction.

function.name: GetWheelDirection
function.desc: Returns the down-direction of the wheel.

function.name: GetMaxSuspensionLength
function.desc: Returns the wheel's maximum suspension length.

function.name: GetMaxSuspensionCompression
function.desc: Returns the wheel's maximum suspension compression.

function.name: GetMaxDampingRelaxation
function.desc: Returns the wheel's damping relaxation.

function.name: GetWheelRadius
function.desc: Returns the wheel's radius.

function.name: GetSuspensionStiffness
function.desc: Returns the wheel's suspension stiffness.

function.name: GetWheelDampingCompression
function.desc: Returns the wheel's damping compression.

function.name: GetFrictionSlip
function.desc: Returns the wheel's friction slip.

function.name: GetSteeringAngle
function.desc: Returns the wheel's steering angle.

function.name: GetWheelRotation
function.desc: Returns the wheel's current rotation around the axle.

function.name: GetRollInfluence
function.desc: Returns the wheel's roll influence.

function.name: GetVehicle
function.desc: Returns the vehicle this wheel is attached to.

function.name: GetRelativeSuspensionSpeed
function.desc: Returns the velocity of the wheel relative to the chassis.

function.name: GetSuspensionForce
function.desc: Returns the force applied to the chassis by the suspension.

function.name: GetSkidGrip
function.desc: The amount of grip between the wheel and the ground surface.

function.name: GetContactNormal
function.desc: Returns the wheel's contact normal with the ground surface.

function.name: GetContactPoint
function.desc: Returns the wheel's contact position with the ground surface.

function.name: IsInContact
function.desc: Returns if the wheel is in contact with the ground surface.

function.name: GetSuspensionLength
function.desc: Returns the current length of the suspension in meters.

function.name: GetWorldSpaceWheelAxle
function.desc: Returns the direction of the wheel axle in world space.

function.name: GetWorldSpaceWheelDirection
function.desc: Returns the wheel direction in world space.

function.name: GetGroundObject
function.desc: Returns the object the wheel is in contact with.
